description.tchinese: 贏得你的第一場戰鬥！

description.english: Hit your opponent’s knees with arrows 50 times
description.german: Triff deine Gegner 50-mal mit Pfeilen ins Knie.
description.french: Atteins d'une flèche 50 adversaires au genou
description.spanish: Golpea con flechas 50 veces la rodilla de tus oponentes
description.schinese: 有 50 支箭射中对手的膝盖
description.tchinese: 有 50 支箭射中對手的膝蓋
description.japanese: 敵の膝を矢で50回射る
description.polish: Traf przeciwnika z łuku w kolano 50 razy

description.english: Finish off the champion “The Cliff” using a slingshot
description.german: Erledige den Champion „Der Berg“ mit einer Steinschleuder.

description.tchinese: 用彈弓打敗勇士“克利夫”
description.japanese: チャンピオン「天邪鬼」をスリングショットで倒す

description.english: Survive a battle with 1 Health Point left
description.german: Überlebe einen Kampf mit nur 1 verbleibenden TP.
description.french: Survis à un combat avec 1 seul point de santé restant
description.spanish: Sobrevive a un combate con 1 Punto de Salud restante
description.schinese: 在生命值还剩 1 点的情况下从一场战斗中幸存下来
description.tchinese: 在生命值還剩 1 點的情況下從一場戰鬥中倖存下來
description.japanese: HPが1の状態でバトルに勝つ

displayName.english: SP - An Offer You Can’t Refuse
displayName.german: Ein Angebot, das du nicht ablehnen kannst
displayName.spanish: Una oferta que no podrás rechazar

description.english: Convince your opponent to spare your miserable life 10 times
description.german: Überrede 10-mal deinen Gegner, dein elendes Leben zu verschonen.
description.french: Convaincs tes adversaires d'épargner 10 fois ta misérable vie
description.spanish: Convence a tus oponentes para que perdonen tu miserable vida 10 veces
description.schinese: 10 次成功说服你的对手饶了你的小命
description.tchinese: 10 次成功說服你的對手饒了你的小命
description.russian: 10 раз убеди противника сохранить твою жалкую жизнь
description.japanese: 命乞いに10回成功する
description.polish: 10 razy przekonaj przeciwnika, aby oszczędził twoje marne życie

description.english: Refuse to spare the life of a begging opponent 10 times
description.german: Weigere dich 10-mal, das Leben eines bettelnden Gegners zu verschonen.
description.french: Refuse 10 fois d'épargner la vie d'adversaires te suppliant
description.spanish: Niégate a perdonarle la vida a tu oponente 10 veces
description.schinese: 10 次拒绝饶恕求饶的对手的性命
description.tchinese: 10 次拒絕饒恕求饒的對手的性命
description.russian: 10 раз откажись проявлять милосердие к противнику, молящему о пощаде
description.japanese: 敵の命乞いを10回断る
description.polish: 10 razy odmów żebrzącemu o życie przeciwnikowi

description.english: Win a combat with 100% crowd excitement

description.english: Betray and give the killing blow to your ally in Free for All match.

description.english: Fart on your friend’s face in a friendly match.
